help-file.title: FORAGE
help-file.content:
Syntax: forage
"Ingredients" are located throughout the world of Duris, buried under the ground. In order to retrieve these ingredients, you must "Forage" for them. Some classes, such as Alchemists and Forest Druids (specialized Druids), need specific ingredients in order to cast spells or mix potions.
Warning: While foraging, you cannot enter new commands for a period of time, making you prone to attack. So, be sure you are relatively safe before foraging!
